name: Suspicious Non PowerShell WSMAN COM Provider
description: Detects suspicious use of the WSMAN provider without PowerShell.exe as the host application.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Windows\ PowerShell AND powershell.provider.name:WSMan AND (NOT (process.command_line:*powershell*)))`
